contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 15, 2013 D Miners Welfare Entertainment Contest
Miners' Welfare Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
miners-welfare-entertainment-contest
None
Grand Pavilion, Porthcawl, Bridgend, Wales, UK Best Cornet: Nia Morris (Soprano, Gwaun Cae Gurwen) Best Soloist: Nanette Jones, Cornet (Ebbw Valley Brass) Best Fourth Section Not in Prizes: Abertillery (£200) Best Third Section Not in Prizes: RAF St Athan (£200) Best Entertainment: Mid Rhondda (£200) Prizes 1st £600, 2nd £400, 3rd £200. 7 bands competed.
Sept. 15, 2013, 8:27 p.m. July 8, 2020, 10:49 a.m.
1 Parc and Dare Band Andrew Jones
2 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Malcolm Read
3 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter
4 A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Joshua Ruck
5 Abertillery & District Youth Dean Evans
6 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
7 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
Withdrawn Ammanford Silver Band Glyn Rhys Davies
Withdrawn Briton Ferry Band Unknown
Withdrawn Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
